<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/registry-svc/echo"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to test the server's response to a GET request.
It echoes back the query parameters as a JSON object.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Echoed query parameters","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
